titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the BBC World Service Vietnamese radio broadcast recordings
BBC World Service Vietnamese radio broadcast recordings
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by BBC World Service Staff and Hoover Institution Archives Staff

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-12-02T11:21-0800
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English.

change.item: February 24, 2014: Added container listing after rehousing

did.unittitle: BBC World Service Vietnamese radio broadcast recordings

physdesc.extent: 2 manuscript boxes, 11 oversize boxes, digital files

did.abstract: Sound recordings of radio broadcasts to Vietnam. Includes some radio scripts and background newspaper clippings.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research. The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Materials were acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 2013.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], BBC World Service Vietnamese radio broadcast recordings, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The BBC World Service (Asia Hub) ended radio broadcasting in March 2011. It included Chinese, Indonesian, Thai, and Vietnamese language services.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Sound recordings of radio broadcasts to Vietnam. Includes some radio scripts and background newspaper clippings. Titles of sound recordings are from tape labels.

did.unittitle: Radio scripts and background newspaper clippings

scopecontent.p: Consists of significant radio broadcast recordings. Among those featured are Nguyen Thi Bihn, Bui Tin, Pham Dry, and Trinh Cong Song. 342 reels, selected for their significance by Hoover staff, have been digitized for use and listed here.
